titles.title: NO NOISE Act
To amend title 49, of the United States Code, to prioritize the reduction of noise pollution in air commerce.
National Overflight and New Onerous, Incessant Sound Elimination Act
NO NOISE Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary:
National Overflight and New Onerous, Incessant Sound Elimination Act or the NO NOISE Act
This bill adds to the list of matters the Department of Transportation must consider as being in the public interest and consistent with public convenience and necessity when developing aviation policy: (1) assigning and maintaining community concerns, including noise, as the second highest priority in air commerce; and (2) evaluating the implications of new air transportation services on affected communities before authorizing such services.
